body_content.explanation: a discussion of a play or film after it has been performed, between people who made it or performed in it and people who watched it:
examples: The theatre offers talkbacks and backstage tours after every performance.
About 150 members of the audience stayed afterward for a talkback session with cast members.

body_content.explanation: radio programmes in which people listening take part by phone:
examples: Talkback is one of the most powerful media formats in Australia.
I was tuned to a talkback radio station.
